turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need a coffee. I'm thinking Starbucks. Can you order one for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, would you like one from the Starbucks on 4th Street in Colorado Springs?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'd be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking a caramel macchiato would be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nice choice! That's my favorite too! And what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande with almond milk would be perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do! Any other toppings or ingredients?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can choose to add whipped cream and a caramel drizzle

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh that sounds great I'll take both so I won't have to add any sugar

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I am sending the order in now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, I need some caffeine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any other special requests before I finalize everything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great the order is in, do you need someone to pick it up for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'll just swing by on my break in 10 minutes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright then. Your drink is on order at the Starbucks on 4th Street in Colorado Springs, and will be ready for pickup shortly. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message so you won't have to pay in store.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent. Thank you so much you have a good day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks. You too. Enjoy your coffee and the rest of your day!
